updown › Basic Usage

Below is a very simple example that illustrates the custom events fired by updown. Resize your window past any of the breakpoints listed in the table and watch the appropriate events get fired.

Example

Resize / Event data
Breakpoints
Current width
Triggered events

Code for this example

 1     // Add a custom breakpoint
 2     var options = { breakpoints: [640] };
 3     var ud = new updown(options);
 4 
 5     // Dynamically create the event markers based on the registered breakpoints returned by updown()
 6     var trigger_list = $('#data-events');
 7     for(i=0; i<ud.length; i++) {
 8         $('<div class="updown-trigger" id="trigger-' + ud[i] + '-down"></div>').html(ud[i] + '.down').appendTo(trigger_list);
 9         $('<div class="updown-trigger" id="trigger-' + ud[i] + '-up"></div>').html(ud[i] + '.up').appendTo(trigger_list);
10     }
11     $('#data-breakpoints').html(ud.join(', '));
12 
13     // Bind our custom events
14     $(window).on({
15         // 320
16         '320.up': function() { $('#trigger-320-up').addClass('updown-triggered') },
17         '320.down': function() { $('#trigger-320-down').addClass('updown-triggered') },
18         // 480 
19         '480.up': function() { $('#trigger-480-up').addClass('updown-triggered') },
20         '480.down': function() { $('#trigger-480-down').addClass('updown-triggered') },
21         // 640 
22         '640.up': function() { $('#trigger-640-up').addClass('updown-triggered') },
23         '640.down': function() { $('#trigger-640-down').addClass('updown-triggered') },
24         // 768 
25         '768.up': function() { $('#trigger-768-up').addClass('updown-triggered') },
26         '768.down': function() { $('#trigger-768-down').addClass('updown-triggered') },
27         // 960 
28         '940.up': function() { $('#trigger-940-up').addClass('updown-triggered') },
29         '940.down': function() { $('#trigger-940-down').addClass('updown-triggered') },
30         // 1024
31         '1024.up': function() { $('#trigger-1024-up').addClass('updown-triggered') },
32         '1024.down': function() { $('#trigger-1024-down').addClass('updown-triggered') },
33         // 1280 
34         '1280.up': function() { $('#trigger-1280-up').addClass('updown-triggered') },
35         '1280.down': function() { $('#trigger-1280-down').addClass('updown-triggered') },
36 
37         // Generic resize events 
38         resize: function() {
39             $('#data-width').empty().html($(this).width() + 'px');
40             $('.updown-triggered').removeClass('updown-triggered');
41         }
42     });
43 
44     $(window).trigger('resize');
